name: TeraFlow
description:
Miami Animation and Gaming International Complex (MAGIC) - Class of 2021 “TeraFlow" Lead Producers - Emmanuel Ojeda, Dairon Abreu and Erik Breto ; Lead Programmer - Abraham D. Anez-Martinez. Industry Mentor - Leah Hoyer (VP Creative at Wizards Games) Faculty - Mel Tomeo



You are one of the chosen individuals to test Doctor Finn’s greatest invention called TeraFlow. In this experiment you will help Finn gather information about the different reactions the human mind has when exposed to extreme environments. In this simulation, you can pick either a cyber obstacle course or an enormous jungle as your playground. Enter TeraFlow and test your skills!
